Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 44th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2015, off Jeffrey Horne (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Ray Becnel (ATL)...
Injured on 8/1/2015 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Francisco on 10/2/2016...
Injured on 3/7/2017 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/30/2017 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/28/2017 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2017, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2017, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Traded from Montreal to St. Louis (B) on 5/26/2018 (Going to SLB: 2B Robert Serrano. Going to MON: CF Brian Peña, 1B Jose Velasquez, RF Pedro Vargas)...
